vulnerability.name: USN-3976-4
vulnerability.description: USN-3976-1 fixed a vulnerability in Samba. The update introduced a regression causing Samba to occasionally crash. This update fixes the problem.  Original advisory details:   Isaac Boukris and Andrew Bartlett discovered that Samba incorrectly checked  S4U2Self packets. In certain environments, a remote attacker could possibly  use this issue to escalate privileges.

statements.status_notes: USN-3976-1 introduced a regression in Samba. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
